definition: exquisite/fine and delicate (usu. of works of art)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: " Where "exactly" the word can be described as exquisite peerless.
sentences.chinese: 这里的“恰好”二字可谓精妙绝伦。

sentences.english: Despite Spain passing well, they weren’t creating a great amount of chances.
sentences.chinese: 尽管西班牙传球精妙，他们也没有制造太多进球机会。

sentences.english: The contemporary riddle culture includes sophisticated puzzles for both children and adults.
sentences.chinese: 现代的谜语文化中也有老少皆宜的精妙谜题。

sentences.english: This is a pretty subtle problem.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个非常精妙的问题。

sentences.english: Something Wicked This Way Comes. Ray Bradbury. Perhaps the subtlest horror story ever written.
sentences.chinese: 也许这是曾经被写过的最精妙的惊骇故事。

sentences.english: The juiciest possibilities often have the best disguises.
sentences.chinese: 最好的机会常常有最精妙的伪装。

sentences.english: Afterwards, Chinese opera can envelop you in the magnigicence of another world, another time .
sentences.chinese: 尔后，中国的戏剧将你领入另一个精妙绝伦的世界。

sentences.english: The really clever bit, though, is how the spheres are made.
sentences.chinese: 但是真正精妙的地方还在于小球是如何制作的。

sentences.english: I can personally attest to the subtle potency of this Attunement.
sentences.chinese: 我能以我个人来证明这个调音的精妙效力。

sentences.english: I have traveled the Quadrant over, and never have I known such an exquisite place.
sentences.chinese: 我曾遍游这片星区，却从不知道这地方如此精妙。

sentences.english: He is very good at mountain-and-water, flower-and-bird, character, and Chinese calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 又以花鸟最为精妙，是位非常罕见的全才画家。

sentences.english: Shakespeare's treatment of madness in "King Lear" is excellent.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚在《李尔王》中对疯癫的处理手法精妙绝伦。

sentences.english: This painting of steeds is exquisite.
sentences.chinese: 这幅《骏马图》画得非常精妙。

sentences.english: In addition, Yong exquisite calligraphy, especially labor official script, great effects.
sentences.chinese: 另外，蔡邕书法精妙，尤工隶书，影响甚大。
毕加索的笔法精妙绝伦。

sentences.english: Something Wicked This Way Comes. Ray Bradbury. Perhaps the subtlest horror story ever written.
sentences.chinese: 年夜略这是曾经被写过的最精妙的恐惧故事。

definition: to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
masterly/subtle and clever (or artwork, writing etc)
lit. moving clouds and flowing water (idiom)/fig. very natural and flowing style of calligraphy, writing, etc/natural and unforced
lit. slap the table and shout with praise (idiom); fig. wonderful!/amazing!/great!
